info.name: Henny's Herd Hoard
info.attribution:
Library image from https://pixabay.com/photos/roosters-hens-chickens-chicken-coop-5599141/ and available for use under the Pixabay license. 
Original game layout inspired by Robin Harn's Herd Hero mod, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

Additional scripting and modifications by DexDouglas, Mitchell Stolycia, and LawDawg released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The following graphics are from https://game-icons.net and are used under CC BY 3.0: * Card Play https://game-icons.net/1x1/quoting/card-play.html * Trash Can https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/trash-can.html * Card Joker https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/card-joker.html * Cat https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/cat.html * Mite https://game-icons.net/1x1/carl-olsen/mite-alt.html * Sea Turtle https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/sea-turtle.html * Chicken https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/chicken.html * Koala https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/koala.html * Kangaroo https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/kangaroo.html * Squid https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/squid.html * Elephant https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/elephant.html * Donkey https://game-icons.net/1x1/skoll/donkey.html * Dolphin https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/dolphin.html
* Barn https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/barn.html
info.description: Henny is trying to amass the biggest hoard of powerful animals to her herd. Try to get 100 points worth of animals on your side before your opponents.
info.ruleText:
Have all players click to sit and then hit New Game. The game will highlight the start player. The goal of the game is to to be the first to reach 100 or more points. Every card you collect is worth points equal to the printed value.
On your turn, click the Draw Cards button to add a card to the "herd holder" at the bottom. If you draw a card that is already in your herd holder, then you bust and earn nothing. If you drew a unique card, then you can end your turn, or keep drawing. 

*COLLECTING*
If you end your turn without busting, first review the cards in the herd holder. If any of the cards match any cards that have been collected by other players in the prior turn, you can click the blue button next to those cards to add them to the herd holder. You will take from ALL of the players ALL of the cards that match cards in your herd holder. Then, click the green "End Turn and Collect" button to move all these cards to spots under your name. These cards are able to be stolen by other players and are only safely added to your total if every other player has a turn and you still have these cards when it is your turn again. The cards will automatically be tallied, added to your score, and moved to the discard. If you haven't reached 100 points yet, then you begin your next turn. 
*BUSTING* If you draw a card that is already present in your herd holder, then you bust and don't collect anything. Hit the red "End Turn and Bust" button at the bottom right. *NOTE* If you bust and you have 3 or less cards in the holder, a barn will be added to the small holder under your name to the left. If you acquire 3 barns, you can push the +50 button and it will remove the barns and give you 50 points. If this causes you to reach or exceed 100 points, you have won the game!

Note: If the deck runs out while drawing cards, just press the Draw Cards button again and the discarded cards will be reshuffled into the draw pile.
